messages.message:
:wave: hi friends, weâ€™ve been fielding some questions about scalability lately, and I was wondering if
a) we have some guidance about how we scale / sizes of problems we should avoid (e.g. FRB has a use case where they want to drop in 1,000 page documents, C1 has a potential use case involving processing 800k documents as a 1-off and then some weekly batch)
and b) is there any ongoing discussion about planning for scalability / are there plans to measure and address in place?
